title.value: Получение износостойких металлопокрытий электродуговой наплавкой плавящимся электродом при воздействии на него ультразвуком
Receiving of wear-resistant metal coating with the help of arc-jet deposit welding with consumable electrode under the influence of ultrasound
Receiving of wear-resistant metal coating with the help of arc-jet deposit welding with consumable electrode under the influence of ultrasound

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Redin, I.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The results of the research on the production of corrosion-resistant metal coatings with the help of wear-arc welding with ultrasonic vibrations are given in the article. Introduction of the additive metal powders decreases the stage of involvement of the parent metal in the process of forming of the surfaced coating and ultrasound influence on the electrode leads to quality improvement of the structure of the weld pad of metal, which has a positive effect on the physical, mechanical and performance properties of the weld metal surfaces, and improves the reliability of equipment parts, components and assemblies of machines.
